title: The first human case report of molecularly confirmed co-infection of Brucella melitensis and Coxiella burnetii: A case report
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Onjira Mangkalamanee, Suwatchareeporn Rotcheewaphan, Pawat Phuensan, Teerada Ponpinit, Thiravat Hemachudha, Pattama Torvorapanit
